Come on, hurry!
- Come on, come on! Hurry! - Wait! Wait!

and be ready for eye check and skin check.

- IDs. - Yes.

No.
One at a time.

- Why not? - Mom?
It's OK, honey, we're coming right now. It's OK.
Stay there, honey, OK?
Thank you. We're coming, honey.

- Yeah. - Dad?
We've been running. We've been running.
- Stand to the side. - I just, I...
I have a lot of... a lot of layers on, that's all.

translation.en: You armed?
No, sir.
Wait! No, no, no, no! Where are you taking him?

translation.en: Sweetheart, just stay there. Stay there. Stay there.
Officer, please. Please.
I just have an upset stomach.
Are you injured?
No, sir. It's just a stomach cramp.
translation.es: - No, señor. Solo son retorcijones. - Quédate ahí, cariño.

Please, sir, my daughter's already on the truck--

I repeat, we are authorized to open fire,
Please. Please. My daughter is already on the truck!

Oh, no, no, no!
- Daddy! - No! No, no, no, no, no! No!
Baby, you wait for me! You wait for me at the stadium!
I promise I will be there! You wait for us! You wait for us! Oh!
Come on! Come on! Come, come! Come on, come on! Please! Come on! Go!
Come on! Come on! Come on! Go, go, go! This way, Rose.
Agh! Ah!
Go, go!
Oh, my God.
How could I do that?
I let her go.
She's all alone now. She's all alone.
We need to get you some more antibiotics.
They'll be moving slowly with all the roadblocks. We'll, um...

Have some water and then we go, OK?
Patrick?
I'm not going, baby.
Fuck you.
You're going.
They're never gonna let you through with me.
Soldiers, right?
They don't know anything.
No, exactly, Rose. They don't.
You realize that.
They don't know what the hell is going on and everything is falling apart, babe.

translation.en: Stop. Stop. I don't need to hear this right now. Stop.

translation.en: You listen to me.
They don't have a plan for us, Rose.

We are on our own, do you understand that?
What does that have to do with our daughter?

translation.en: Stop.
Do you want to leave her out there?
You want to leave her there? You want to leave her alone?
- Is that what you want? - No, I don't! No!

I'm not gonna make it, Rose.

translation.en: - I'm not making it. - No. No.
I'm not gonna be let through anywhere.

translation.en: No. I am not leaving you here.
translation.es: - No te dejaré aquí. - Por favor.

translation.en: - Please. - No. No.
translation.es: - No. - Por favor, cariño. Tienes que hacerlo.

translation.es: - No. - Por favor, cariño. Tienes que hacerlo. No puedo. Escucha.

translation.en: Baby, please. No, no, no, no. Listen to me, OK? Listen. Hey.
Let's find her together, OK? We're gonna find her together.

I'm sorry. I love you.
I love you.
I love you so much.
So, so, so, so, so much.
OK, baby? Listen.
You have to trust me. I will get us there.

Yeah.

Patrick?
Patrick!
Patrick?
Patrick! Patrick!
My daughter.

Help me.
Please.
Take me there.
I'll help you.

Motherfucker!
- Look out! Look out! -
Get the fuck out of here.
Go! Now, get out! Get out! Get the fuck out of here!
OK.
Please. Please, I beg you, please.
Thank you. Thank you.
My family's back there. We need to get to the stadium.

translation.en: That's where you're going, right?
Well, yes, but--
Can give us a ride, please? We have food.
I don't think that that is a good idea.

translation.en: Yes.
I'm sorry, I can't. It's not safe out here.

translation.es: Es muy inseguro. La gente le bloqueará el camino. Le robarán el combustible y dejarán que se muera. Lo sé.

translation.en: and leave you for dead. I know. I'm a good person.

translation.en: Not everybody, though. Not out here.

translation.en: I don't know you.
I need... I need to find my husband.

translation.en: I'll help you. You need a man with you.

translation.en: So have I.
So you know.
I need to get to the stadium.

translation.en: Yes, we'll do it. Please, ma'am, I beg you.

- Barbara. - Barbara...
Are you Christian, Barbara?
Yes.
Barbara, I swear to God,
I will protect you and get you to the stadium safely.

You may as well... This isn't even my car.

Can you unlock the door?
Sure.
Don't screw me.
I promise I will not.
It's not right.
I will not.
OK.
I'm sliding over now.
So, how old are your kids?
Get out.
- What? - Get out of the car.
You're messing with me. Please. Shit! Get out of the car or I'll hurt you.

translation.en: You are a terrible person.
You are going straight to hell, you piece of shit!

translation.en: - You hear me? - The door is locked,
translation.es: Bájese del auto o la golpearé, perra. ¿Me escucha? La puerta está cerrada, imbécil. Jesús.

translation.en: Hey!
Are you sure this is the right street?

translation.en: Fuck.
Unless you think we missed it.

OK, I think we head east on Madison.

- Got it? - Yeah.
OK. OK.
Have a seat.

I'm not the guy you're looking for.

translation.en: But you know that.
Yeah, that's not your problem, though.

translation.en: You just do what you're told. Doesn't matter what's right.

translation.en: - Shut up. - All I'm saying, man, is you don't even know what's the charge.

translation.en: Some of y'all are taking the opportunity

translation.en: to settle your scores.
Flex on the world.

translation.en: While there's still a world.
But you all are scared.
Aren't you?
Huh?
Shitting your pants?
Look, man,
I know how it is.
I hear how they talk to you, giving you all this shit work.

translation.en: - Fuck off! - Hey, settle down, brother.
translation.es: - Te dan este trabajo de mierda. - ¡Vete al demonio! Tranquilo, hermano.

translation.en: You got the wrong guy.
That sit well with you?
translation.es: - ¿Eso te parece bien? - No me importa.

translation.es: - ¿Eso te parece bien? - No me importa. Te tiraremos en el velero.

translation.en: The brig?
There is no more brig, man, where you been?
translation.es: No hay más veleros, hombre. ¿Dónde has estado?

translation.en: The hell there isn't.
No, no, no. I know where they're taking me.
I know what they're looking for, too. Know what I mean?

translation.en: You really think
I would still be alive
if I didn't have something they want?

things they wanna know?
Dude, shut up. I told you--

Millions.

- No. - Yeah, you do.

What do you say? Some Bonnie and Clyde shit.
Shit. Sit the fuck down!

Come on.
Piss in the corner.
Right there?
All right. That's nasty.
Can I put hands up front?
Unless you wanna hold my dick for me.

Thank you.
Shit. I can't go.
Fine, then you're good.
Come on, man! Let me use the head.

I'm coming with you.
Great.
This the bathroom?
I don't know, check it.
Bedroom.

Why don't you be a dear and help me out?
Fuck you.
- - Back up! Back up!
- Out of our way! - Move to the side!
Please! Come on, people! Stop!
- Move! Move! - I ain't going nowhere!
Fuck off!
Back the fuck up! Back up!
Ladies and gentlemen, this access point is closed, OK?

translation.en: Let us through, that's an order!

translation.en: - That's a negative, sir. - I need to get to my daughter!

translation.en: Can't you hear that? We're under attack!
And what the fuck are you gonna do about it?

translation.en: - Officer, open the gate now! - Sir, evacuation's complete!

translation.en: - We can't let anyone else in! - You took my fucking daughter
translation.es: Señor, la evacuación está completa. ¡No podemos dejar pasar a nadie! ¡Quiero a mi hija conmigo!

translation.en: from me, you fucker!
Shut the fuck up! Shut the fuck up!
Hey, you can come with us.
